mapper.select: select a.id, a.title, a.update_time, a.topic_type, count(b.id) replyNum from cm_topic a left join pm_topic_reply b on a.id = b.topic_id where a.user_id = #{userId} group by a.id order by update_time desc
select user_topic_type userTopicType, count(0) count from rl_user_topic_action where user_id = #{userId} group by user_topic_type
select title, b.create_time, topic_id id from cm_topic a left join rl_user_topic_action b on a.id = b.topic_id where user_topic_type = 'COLLECTION' and b.user_id = #{userId}
